summary: Jeddah Tower, also known as Kingdom Tower, is a super-tall skyscraper being built in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. It aims to be the world's tallest building, standing at an impressive 1 kilometer (3,281 feet) tall. The project is led by Prince Al-Waleed bin Talal and was designed by Adrian Smith, who also designed the Burj Khalifa. Construction began but was paused in 2018 due to labor issues. Recently, in 2023, work resumed as new construction firms were invited to complete the tower.
title: Jeddah Tower
